issue.title: signin.costco.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://signin.costco.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fsignin.costco.com) ### Comment > I am unable to log in to costco.ca (which goes through signin.costco.com) with AdGuard enabled. Even when I've disabled every single filtering option in the app, it only works if I actually quit AdGuard. Username: `@deviantintegral` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/2ug0d75jpneo4sgg8oww8sggw80w4gcn8ptw610t8g.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/hvp0jtw6e60wsc48k4w0k8gkkgwko04l5krc9aegf4.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.15.1.1731 release System version: | macOS 14.6.1 Browser: | Safari License type: | paid Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | disabled Userstyles: | disabled Other extensions used: | 1Password, Kagi for Safari

comment.body: What were you hoping to see with those? Something in the logs? They blocked all access to all pages.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.google.com/search?q=translator&ie=UTF-8](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Dtranslator%26ie%3DUTF-8) ### Comment > If I turn off AdGuard, the translator works fine. If you turn on AdGuard, not only this button but also the translation function will not work. Not only the translator but also the stock graph 1 year 5 year maximum period buttons that can be used in Google's main search do not work. When you hit a certain store, the results are displayed on the map. When you click on the store, it should get bigger and show more detailed information, but that doesn't work either. > > For some reason, many of the features available in the main Google search do not work. This seems to be the core problem. Username: `@.` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/tl8ek2tths0wgckcc8oocssgsso80kkd7z8gqhhwm8.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/t6luim3tzggwcg84sgg8c008c8ks0g4rmu8p0y6vc0.png?nc=1)

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.google.com/search?q=adguard+report+and+issue&rlz=1C1RXQR_enAU1028AU1028&oq=adguard+report+and+issue&gs_lcrp=EgZjaHJvbWUyBggAEEUYOTIICAEQABgWGB4yDQgCEAAYhgMYgAQYigUyDQgDEAAYhgMYgAQYigUyDQgEEAAYhgMYgAQYigUyDQgFEAAYhgMYgAQYigUyDQgGEAAYhgMYgAQYigUyCggHEAAYgAQYogQyCggIEAAYgAQYogQyCggJEAAYgAQYogTSAQkxMTk2N2owajeoAgCwAgA&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Dadguard%2Breport%2Band%2Bissue%26rlz%3D1C1RXQR_enAU1028AU1028%26oq%3Dadguard%2Breport%2Band%2Bissue%26gs_lcrp%3DEgZjaHJvbWUyBggAEEUYOTIICAEQABgWGB4yDQgCEAAYhgMYgAQYigUyDQgDEAAYhgMYgAQYigUyDQgEEAAYhgMYgAQYigUyDQgFEAAYhgMYgAQYigUyDQgGEAAYhgMYgAQYigUyCggHEAAYgAQYogQyCggIEAAYgAQYogQyCggJEAAYgAQYogTSAQkxMTk2N2owajeoAgCwAgA%26sourceid%3Dchrome%26ie%3DUTF-8) ### Comment > Basically using adguard extra on some streams on twitch freezes the stream continuously when it tries to block ads. > > Some streams are more frequently freezing than others depending on the streamers ad settings Username: `@LLS` ### Screenshots
